column4: In my custom keyboard layout, can I have a key press correspond to the same as alt+SOMEKEY?  Or is there some way to have altGr act as alt when a 3rd level does not exist?
look in layout options in keyboard prefs
okay, I'm there, which option should I try?
sorry for delay, the "key for 3rd level"-options might make something happen...
I have my right alt  as the third-level-chooser (not using this dialog though) but I am trying to make it so that if I hit right-alt and some other key it still acts as alt plus that key
when there is no third level of course
like I said, I only saw the DVDs there.
no, you didn't say where is "there" :)
ah, I took "ubuntu's servers" as implying that, as opposed to "ubuntu's homepage"... but anyways, so they're gone then?
did you check the second link I gave you (they are there)?
Why is cdimage and releases different and unlinked? hmm...
sorry about the afk before, since I had open conversations I thought it would be the least rude way to leave them.
they should be listed there.  If you prefer, just edit /etc/apt/sources.list and run « sudo apt-get update »
